text:
Resurfacing this suggestion from the ideas forum since itâ€™s recently been relevant for me again: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Tags-Categories-for-CMS-pages/idi-p/455347|Tags/Collections/Categories for CMS Pages>

In my experience, the lack of content structuring tools has been the _number one_ thing that has put HubSpot CMS out of the running for clients looking to replatform their websites. I would say that this single feature would reduce the number of clients I put on other platforms by at least 50%, if not more.
